message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this exclusive item to you at an introductory price of $1,300,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $1,500,000 to you, at a significant discount. We look forward to hearing your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1,250,000.  This is still a good deal for you, as you've stated your minimum acceptable price is $1,200,000. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we're pleased to provide you with a counteroffer of $1,275,000 for the product. We believe this price strikes a balance between our minimum acceptable price and your proposed offer. We hope this proposal will be more agreeable to you.
